blogs.title: Politicians want to speed up drug approvals. That could backfire.
blogs.summary: (Saul Loeb/AFP/Getty Images) To patients grappling with incurable diseases, new therapies can't come quickly enough. A bill that hopes to address this need sailed through the House in the summer with the goal of getting more "21st Century Cures"
